name: blob-ui
description: A light UI-Theme for Atom with fancy tabs and costumizable colors
readme:
# Blob UI

A fork of the Atom Light Theme with fancy, colorful tabs.

The colors can be costumized via the color picker in the settings menu _(Color Picker Code was copied from https://atom.io/themes/accents-ui)_. If you change the color, you need to reload atom to see the change.

![Colorpicker](http://i.imgur.com/T6hoEBh.gif)

I personally recommend the [Material Design Colors](http://www.google.com/design/spec/style/color.html#color-color-palette), just convert them to rgb values using some kind of [tool](http://hex.colorrrs.com/)

Still got some work to do, like styling the setting tab or dropdowns.



![Demo](http://i.imgur.com/wRhgCWR.gif)




:heart: Feel free to submit pull requests or other suggestions. :heart:
